snippet.title: Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch Remastered - Launch Trailer | PS4, PC (Remastered); Switch
snippet.description:
For the first time ever, journey to the other world in Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch on Nintendo Switch! Players can also relive the adventures with the Remastered version for PS4 or PC, now better than ever with improved graphics and performance!

This charming tale unfolds through the use of animation storyboarded and created by the legendary Studio Ghibli and music composed by the renowned Joe Hisaishi. Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch combines beautiful animated visuals, masterful storytelling, and a sweeping score to create an epic role-playing adventure like no other.

Order today and start playing September 20th
Nintendo Switch - https://bandainam.co/NNK-NSW
Remastered for PS4 & PC: https://bandainam.co/nnk-remastered

#NinoKuni #JRPG #BandaiNamco

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
